senses.sense_definition: A type of langur monkey native to Sri Lanka.

examples.text: The purple-faced <w>wanderoo</w> is an endangered species living in the canopy.
Travelers in the rainforest were delighted to see a <w>wanderoo</w> leaping between branches.

senses.sense_definition: The lion-tailed macaque, a monkey species found in India.

examples.text: The <w>wanderoo</w> is easily recognized by the distinctive silver mane around its face.
Conservation efforts are crucial to protect the habitat of the rare <w>wanderoo</w>.
